author: Unreal Sensei
description:
In this video we will cover all the essential information we know about Unreal Engine 6 and how it will change game development. Keep in mind that a large part of this video is speculation, there is a link below to the sources I used to piece together what UE6 could look like.

Check out the Unreal Masterclass on sale for Black Friday:
https://www.unrealmasterclass.com

Watch the UE5 Starter Course:
https://youtu.be/k-zMkzmduqI

Stay up-to-date with the Unreal Newsletter:
https://www.unrealsenseinewsletter.com

Link to Sources:
https://www.unrealsensei.com/news/ue6-speculation-sources

Chapters
0:00 - UE6 Release
1:20 - Unreal Editor for Fortnite
2:40 - Verse
5:45 - Scene Graph
6:25 - Metaverse
title: Why Unreal Engine 6 Will Be a Game Changer
